verses.verse: Then <S%H227><s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H853>and<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes,<s%> the <S%H5387>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> that they might bring <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> out of the <S%H4480>city<s%> <S%H5892><s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> assembled <S%H6950>themselves<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> at the <S%H2282>feast<s%> in the <S%H3391>month<s%> <S%H388>Ethanim,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>
And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> took <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark.<s%>

And they brought <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in the <S%H168>tabernacle,<s%> even those did the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> bring <S%H5927>up.<s%>

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that were <S%H3259>assembled<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> him, were <S%H854>with<s%> him <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark,<s%> <S%H2076>sacrificing<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> could <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H5608>told<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H4487>numbered<s%> for <S%H4480>multitude.<s%> <S%H7230><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> brought <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H4725>place,<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H1687>oracle<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, even <S%H413>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubims.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> their two <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> <S%H5526>covered<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> and the <S%H905>staves<s%> thereof <S%H4480>above.<s%> <S%H4605><s%>

And they drew <S%H748>out<s%> the <S%H905>staves,<s%> that the <S%H7218>ends<s%> of the <S%H905>staves<s%> were <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H4480>out<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1687>oracle,<s%> and they were <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2351>without:<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H1961>are<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

There was <S%H369>nothing<s%> in the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H7535>save<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5117>put<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> at <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a covenant <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when they came <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when the <S%H3548>priests<s%> were come <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, that the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%>

So that the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
Then <S%H227><s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> that he would <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the thick <S%H6205>darkness.<s%>
I have surely <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1129><s%> thee a <S%H1004>house<s%> to dwell <S%H2073>in,<s%> a settled <S%H4349>place<s%> for thee to abide <S%H3427>in<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> about, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> (and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5975>stood;)<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H854>unto<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and hath with his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> it, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Since <S%H4480><s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4714><s%> I <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> out of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house,<s%> that my <S%H8034>name<s%> might <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8033>therein;<s%> but I <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5973>in<s%> the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H3282>Whereas<s%> <S%H834><s%> it <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5973>in<s%> thine <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> unto my <S%H8034>name,<s%> thou didst <S%H2895>well<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> it <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5973>in<s%> thine <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

Nevertheless <S%H7535><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house;<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%> that shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of thy <S%H4480>loins,<s%> <S%H2504><s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> unto my <S%H8034>name.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6965>performed<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> and I am risen <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H8478>room<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>promised,<s%> and have <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And I have <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for the <S%H727>ark,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> <S%H8033><s%> is the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H3772>made<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> when he brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H5048>presence<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> toward heaven: <S%H8064><s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> like <S%H3644>thee,<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4480>above,<s%> <S%H4605><s%> or <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H4480>beneath,<s%> <S%H8478><s%> who <S%H8104>keepest<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2617>mercy<s%> with thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> that <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee with <S%H3605>all<s%> their heart: <S%H3820><s%>

Who <S%H834><s%> hast <S%H8104>kept<s%> with thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou <S%H1696>promisedst<s%> him: thou <S%H1696>spakest<s%> also with thy <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and hast <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> it with thine <S%H3027>hand,<s%> as it is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Therefore <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> with thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou <S%H1696>promisedst<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> There shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3772>fail<s%> thee a <S%H376>man<s%> in my <S%H4480>sight<s%> <S%H6440><s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H7535>so<s%> <S%H518>that<s%> thy <S%H1121>children<s%> take heed <S%H8104>to<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1870>way,<s%> that they <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me <S%H834>as<s%> thou hast <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me.

And <S%H6258>now,<s%> O <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> let thy <S%H1697>word,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> be <S%H539>verified,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H1696>spakest<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father.<s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> will <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H552>indeed<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H776>earth?<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H8064>heaven<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3557>contain<s%> thee; how much <S%H637>less<s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H1129>built?<s%>

Yet have thou <S%H6437>respect<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H8467>supplication,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H7440>cry<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6419>prayeth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee today: <S%H3117><s%>

That thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> may <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H3117>day,<s%> even <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H8034>name<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8033>there:<s%> that thou mayest <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall <S%H6419>make<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

And <S%H8085>hearken<s%> thou <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H8467>supplication<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> they shall <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place:<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> thy <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H4725>place:<s%> and when thou <S%H8085>hearest,<s%> <S%H5545>forgive.<s%>

<S%H853><s%> <S%H834>If<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2398>trespass<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and an <S%H423>oath<s%> be <S%H5377>laid<s%> upon him to cause him to <S%H422>swear,<s%> and the <S%H422>oath<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thine <S%H4196>altar<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> house: <S%H1004><s%>

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H6213>do,<s%> and <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H7561>condemning<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> to <S%H5414>bring<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> upon his <S%H7218>head;<s%> and <S%H6663>justifying<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> him according to his <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

When thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be smitten <S%H5062>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H341>enemy,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thee, and shall turn <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> thee, and <S%H3034>confess<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H6419>pray,<s%> and make <S%H2603>supplication<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee in <S%H2088>this<s%> house: <S%H1004><s%>

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H5414>gavest<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

When <S%H8064>heaven<s%> is shut <S%H6113>up,<s%> and there <S%H1961>is<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4306>rain,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thee; if they <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H3034>confess<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> from their <S%H4480>sin,<s%> <S%H2403><s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> thou <S%H6031>afflictest<s%> them:

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thou <S%H3384>teach<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> <S%H834>the<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> wherein they should <S%H1980>walk,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> to thy <S%H5971>people<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
